Detailed Description

Drag and Drop type that encodes a list of DzProperty objects.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzPropertyGroupListDrag::DzPropertyGroupListDrag ( const DzPropertyGroupList &  propGroupList  ) 

Creates a new drag object that encodes a list of Property pointers. This drag object provides the MIME type: "DAZStudio/propertygroupptr-list"

Parameters:
propGroupList The list of Property pointers to encode in this drag object.
dragSource A pointer to the widget that generated the drag object.

Member Function Documentation

void DzPropertyGroupListDrag::decode ( const QMimeData *  src,
DzPropertyGroupList &  propGroupList 
) [static]

Convenience function for decoding the MIME type: "DAZStudio/propertygroupptr-list" Populates propGroupList with pointers to DzProperty objects as decoded form src.

Parameters:
src A pointer to a MIME source that encodes a list of DzProperty pointers.
propGroupList This list will be populated with the pointers encoded in src.
bool DzPropertyGroupListDrag::decode ( const QMimeSource *  src,
DzPropertyGroupList &  propGroupList 
) [static]

Convenience function for decoding the MIME type: "DAZStudio/propertygroupptr-list" Populates propGroupList with pointers to DzProperty objects as decoded form src.

Parameters:
src A pointer to a MIME source that encodes a list of DzProperty pointers.
propGroupList This list will be populated with the pointers encoded in src.
QByteArray DzPropertyGroupListDrag::encode ( const DzPropertyGroupList &  propGroupList  )  [static]

Convenience function to encode a list of Property pointers into the MIME type: "DAZStudio/propertygroupptr-list".

Parameters:
propGroupList The list of Property pointers to encode.
Returns:
A QByteArray containing the list encoded as MIME data.
